== Details ==
=== Nebula PCI dvb-t tuner ===

''sudo apt-get install kaffeine kaffeine-xine xine-ui dvb-utils libxine-extracodecs''

''sudo modprobe bttv dvb-bt8xx nxt6000 mt352''

Let's make them load automatically on starup.
''sudo nano /etc/modules''
And add 

''bttv

dvb-bt8xx

nxt6000

mt352''

Save and exit.

Then start kaffeine, and go to DVB -> Settings. Set your location. Then scan in "channels". Enjoy.
